details.description: The idea is to connect with the whole of Pune Drupal Community - which means everyone is more than welcome to join and contribute. During this meetup, we can do a couple of sessions (nothing pre-defined), demos and later may be breakup into BoF session. The venue for such gatherings would mostly be Company offices (different every month). Thanks to them for supporting these meetups!!
